txt.en: Assisted Offram with Blankets for the Winter
Assisted Offram with Horns for Battle
Offram was pleased with your hunting prowess and offering of meat, hides, and ivory from the aurochs of the Vale.

'I am glad that you have considered the plight of my people. Indeed, I do have more tasks for you.

'On your last venture, you brought me a large quantity of aurochs-meat, hides, and ivory. I need you to take these materials and help me provision the garrison and the town.

'Will you do this?'
Offram stands guard outside the Vendor Hall at Eaworth.\n\nOffram has asked you to help provision the garrison and town of Eaworth.
'My thanks to you, friend [placeholder]. Your assistance will help Eaworth stand strong against the siege.'
Offram stands guard outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth.\n\nYou should return to Offram with news of your successes.
Assist Offram with Blankets for the Winter
Assist Offram with Horns for Battle
Talk to Offram outside the Vendor Hall in Eaworth
